tool_description: Search thousands of cocktail recipes. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/cocktail.
name: Cocktail by API-Ninjas
title: Cocktail by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/cocktail
api_list.description: API Ninjas Cocktail API endpoint. Either **name** or **ingredients** parameter must be set.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: name of cocktail. This parameter supports partial matches (e.g. bloody will match bloody mary and bloody margarita)

optional_parameters.name: ingredients
optional_parameters.description: comma-separated string of ingredients to search. Only cocktails containing all listed ingredients will be returned. For example, to search cocktails containing Vodka and lemon juice, use vodka,lemon juice.
